root.name: Root
root.description: Roots are steady and relationship-centered. You are motivated by belonging, harmony, and connection. You nurture trust and create safety for others.

root_trunk.name: Root-Trunk
root_trunk.description: Balances connection with growth. You seek harmony while building skills that strengthen relationships. You support others by developing yourself.

trunk.name: Trunk
trunk.description: Trunks are disciplined and mastery-seeking. You are motivated by growth, persistence, and reliability. You bring stability and endurance to those around you.

trunk_branch.name: Trunk-Branch
trunk_branch.description: Blends mastery with impact. You pursue skills not just for yourself but to shape outcomes. You combine depth with influence.

branch.name: Branch
branch.description: Branches are bold and impact-focused. You are motivated by contribution, leadership, and shaping systems. You create momentum and legacy.

branch_leaf.name: Branch-Leaf
branch_leaf.description: Merges impact with discovery. You create change through innovation and new approaches. You are energized by making a difference and exploring possibilities.

leaf.name: Leaf
leaf.description: Leaves are energetic and novelty-driven. You thrive on discovery, freshness, and variety. You inspire creativity and curiosity in others.

leaf_root.name: Leaf-Root
leaf_root.description: Bridges exploration with connection. You seek new experiences that bring people together. Adventure and belonging are linked for you.

cautious.description: Cautious gut. You lean on outside input before deciding. Your strength is thoroughness and humility.

balanced.description: Balanced gut. You weigh instincts against evidence. Your strength is measured judgment and clarity.

confident.description: Confident gut. You trust your inner compass. Your decisiveness inspires others.

intuitive.description: Intuitive gut. You rely strongly on your instincts. Your strength is conviction and speed.

permeable.description: Permeable walls. You adapt quickly when proven wrong. Your strength is openness and flexibility.

flexible.description: Flexible walls. You hold some truths firmly while remaining open to change. Your strength is balance.

steady.description: Steady walls. You commit with persistence while allowing time for change. Your strength is resilience with wisdom.

strong.description: Strong walls. You hold truths tightly, providing consistency and stability. Your strength is reliability and dependability.

action.description: Action learner. You learn best by doing, testing, and discovering firsthand. Your strength is speed and courage.

experiential.description: Experiential learner. You balance action with selective input. Your strength is timing and discernment.

inquisitive.description: Inquisitive learner. You actively gather knowledge from multiple sources. Your strength is preparedness and depth.

collector.description: Broad collector. You constantly seek information and perspectives. Your strength is curiosity and adaptability.

quiet.description: Quiet contributor. You share sparingly, letting presence speak. Your strength is calm influence and focus.

selective.description: Selective sharer. You share when useful and adjust to context. Your strength is discernment and timing.

expressive.description: Expressive sharer. You often share ideas to clarify and connect. Your strength is building trust and alignment.

amplifier.description: Amplifier. You broadcast boldly and widely. Your strength is persuasion, visibility, and inspiration.

independent.description: Independent start. Your first instinct is to act solo. Your strength is self-reliance and courage.

solo_grounded.description: Solo-grounded. You anchor in your own strength before connecting. Your strength is steadiness and reliability.

collaborative.description: Collaborative driver. You lean into team and group contexts. Your strength is shared momentum.

people_first.description: People-first engager. Your first instinct is to connect with others. Your strength is immediate collaboration and connection.

harmonious_nurturer.name: Harmonious Nurturer
harmonious_nurturer.description: You quietly maintain harmony and support others behind the scenes. Your strength lies in trusted relationships and gentle influence.

inspiring_connector.name: Inspiring Connector
inspiring_connector.description: You actively build community through enthusiastic sharing. Your strength is creating inclusive, energizing environments.

grounded_analyst.name: Grounded Analyst
grounded_analyst.description: You focus on accuracy and depth, sharing selectively. Your strength is consistency and precision.

impactful_driver.name: Impactful Driver
impactful_driver.description: You push for results with bold clarity. Your strength is rallying others and driving change.

blended_origin.name: Blended Origin
blended_origin.description: You move flexibly across styles, adapting to what the moment needs. Your strength is integration and versatility.
